plot: In World War 2, a Chinese General chooses to stay in the city which the Japanese has invaded. Face to the Japanese, he has to make a choice between his family or his country.
title: Tea
plot_es: In World War 2, a Chinese General chooses to stay in the city which the Japanese has invaded. Face to the Japanese, he has to make a choice between his family or his country.
plot_en: In World War 2, a Chinese General chooses to stay in the city which the Japanese has invaded. Face to the Japanese, he has to make a choice between his family or his country.
